name: PyAT 0.3.0
body:
## Main changes
* The default passmethod for RF cavities is now `RFCavityPass` instead of CavityPass
* Introduction of wake elements: `WakeElement`, `ResonatorElement`, `LongResonatorElement`, `ResWallElement`,
* Lifetime and dynamic aperture calculations,
* new ` Lattice.reduce` method,
* Some badly named functions and methods now have aliases with more meaningful names:
  
  | legacy name | new name |
  | -------------| ---------- |
  | `Lattice.radiation_on` | `Lattice.enable_6d` |
  | `Lattice.radiation_off` | `Lattice.disable_6d` |
  | `Lattice.radiation` | `Lattice.is_6d` |
  | `@check_radiation` | `@check_6d` |
  | `@set_radiation` | `@set_6d` |
  
  From now on, it is recommended to use the new names.
* Computation and plot of the lattice geometry

## What's Changed
* Skip test_patpass on linux and MacOS by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/357
* Documentation upgrade by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/355
* Move the 'constants' module to the top by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/365
* Default particle by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/367
* Include the test lattices in the distribution by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/366
* Test patpass re-enabled + flake8 clean-up by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/369
* Custom elements by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/371
* Haissinski solver for short range wake by @lcarver in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/361
* Add a "turn" input to atpass by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/376
* Set the default cavity PassMethod to RFCavityPass by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/372
* Wake factory methods by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/383
* add collimator element by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/397
* Lifetime and DA calculations for pyAT by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/351
* Added catch to sigma_matrix. Added AtErrors and AtWarnings by @lcarver in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/387
* Improvement of RF frequency control by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/414
* Silent atpass by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/421
* Update of setuptools_scm by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/422
* New Lattice.reduce method by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/429
* Run Matlab tests in GitHub actions by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/432
* Fix a build problem with numpy 1.23 by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/431
* Fix crash in pickling / unpickling Lattice objects by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/438
* Fix help on get_cells by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/448
* Improve import from matlab by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/442
* PyAT: improved timelag solver by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/451
* Fill pattern by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/452
* Fit integer tune by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/458
* patpass poolsize as global DConstant option by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/459
* Compute and plot 2D ring geometry by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/460
* Fix and improve some doctrings by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/478
* Handle diffusion element in radiation_off() by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/453
* Update packaging and installation by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/483
* Introduce missing aliases by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/489

## Bug fixes
* Fix bug in CavityPass.c by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/358
* Fix WakeElement by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/362
* correct fundamental cavity mask  by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/385
* Energy loss tracking by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/393
* Avoid problems with GitHub Windows runners by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/400
* Initialisation of the harmonic number by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/401
* Multipole can be instantiated by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/455
* Fix acceptance by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/457
* pyAT Bugfix: 1D acceptance for recursive grid + help improve by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/484

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atcollab/at/compare/pyat-0.2.2...pyat-0.3.0

name: Matlab AT 2.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Improvement of RF frequency control by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/414
* fix empty orbit in atlinopt by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/434
* Run Matlab tests in GitHub actions by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/432
* Update of Matlab physical constants by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/437
* Fix Matlab tests by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/439
* Fix atcavityoff by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/447
* Matlab ring properties by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/443
* Matlab release 2.4 by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/479


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atcollab/at/compare/2.3...2.4

name: Matlab AT 2.3
body:
## Main changes

* `atlinopt6` replaces `atlinopt` in some optics function: `atplot`, `atfittune`, `atfitchrom`,…
  This allows working with 6D lattices. However there are still many functions still using `atlinopt`. The transition will be continued,
* 2 new functions `atGetRingProperties` and `atSetRingProperties` handle global lattices parameters (energy, periodicity, particle, harmonic number). They are stored in the optional RingParam lattice element. Its use is now recommended since it avoids lengthy searches when a parameter is requested,
* A new function `atloadlattice` makes reading lattice files easier,
* The default passmethod for cavities is now `RFCavityPass` instead of `CavityPass`. `CavityPass` is still available but should not be used: it is wrong for multi-tune tracking if the RF frequency is not the nominal one.

## List of changes
* Linopt6 in plots and parameters by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/297
* first look at PolynomB in *LinearPass by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/290
* Updated plotAperture by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/313
* Remove the dependency of RFCavityPass on harmonic number by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/319
* Remove the dependency of find_orbit6 on the harmonic number by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/318
* Added optional tolerances in "TouschekPiwinskiLifeTime" by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/326
* New README.md file in the docs directory by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/331
* New Lattice properties: energy, harmonic number and particle by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/329
* Fix problems reading .mat files by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/341
* allow fit chrom with radon by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/349
* Cavity phase offset arg by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/348
* atenergy computes the harmonic number from the RF frequency by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/350
* atsetcavity accepts dp and dct arguments by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/354
* Energy and particle available to C integrators by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/368
* Allow setting "dp" in 6D linear optics by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/364
* New Matlab function atloadlattice by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/377
* Add a "turn" input to atpass by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/376
* Set the default cavity PassMethod to RFCavityPass by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/372

## Bug fixes
* Fix on atfastring by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/314
* Fit tunes and chromaticities by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/327
* Fix WakeFieldPass in Matlab by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/343
* Fix problems with transfer line mode by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/342
* Fix bug in CavityPass.c by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/358
* Fix WakeElement by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/362
* Fix atplot when energy is undefined by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/375
* Correct bug in plotbetadispcurlyh.m by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/382
* Fix plCorrectorStrength by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/392

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atcollab/at/compare/2.0...2.3

name: PyAT 0.2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Pyat docs by @willrogers in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/300
* Use pyproject.toml to add numpy build dependency. by @willrogers in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/306
* Remove useless files in at integrators by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/309
* Updated plotAperture by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/313
* Check keys on load by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/312
* Fix on atfastring by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/314
* Cleanup Lattice and cavity access by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/316
* Remove the dependency of RFCavityPass on harmonic number by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/319
* Remove the dependency of find_orbit6 on the harmonic number by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/318
* Fix bug in at.c by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/321
* Use the safer lattice_pass instead of atpass in tests by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/322
* Pythonised the sigma matrix function by @lcarver in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/307
* Added optional tolerances in "TouschekPiwinskiLifeTime" by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/326
* Fit tunes and chromaticities by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/327
* pypassmethods examples and tests adpated to new rin format by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/330
* New README.md file in the docs directory by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/331
* New Lattice properties: energy, harmonic number and particle by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/329
* Restructure the web site by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/333
* Website improvement by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/336
* Website: Setup for bundler by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/337
* Collective effects with MPI + improve interface to passmethod impedance by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/320
* Set the default particle to "electron" by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/339
* Fix problems reading .mat files by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/341
* RF cavity tuning: introduce fundamental frequency by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/334
* Fix WakeFieldPass in Matlab by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/343
* Fix problems with transfer line mode by @lfarv in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/342
* allow fit chrom with radon by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/349
* Cavity phase offset arg by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/348
* check/set multi-processing start method in patpass by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/347

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atcollab/at/compare/pyat-0.2.1...pyat-0.2.2

name: PyAT 0.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* first look at PolynomB in *LinearPass by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/290
* Test for use of keep_lattice in find_orbit6(). by @willrogers in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/301
* Avoid W and Chrom calculations in transfer line mode by @swhite2401 in https://github.com/atcollab/at/pull/304

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atcollab/at/compare/pyat-0.2.0...pyat-0.2.1
